settings.name: list
settings.sql: WITH CorpTree AS( SELECT CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CorpID) AS VARCHAR(10)) AS ID1, * FROM view_corp WHERE CorpID={0} UNION ALL SELECT CAST(ID1+ CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.CorpID) AS VARCHAR(10)) AS VARCHAR(10)), B.* FROM CorpTree A JOIN view_corp B ON A.CorpID=B.ParentID ) SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1)OVER() AS RowsCount,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.ID1) AS RowNum,A.CorpID,A.ParentID,A.CorpLevel, CorpName,A.CorpContact, A.CorpPhone,A.CorpAddress,B.CollaborationName, CASE WHEN A.Enable=1 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END AS Enable FROM CorpTree A LEFT JOIN T_SYS_Collaboration B ON A.CollaborationID=B.collaborationId ) T WHERE T.RowNum between {1} and {2} AND T.CorpLevel>0
settings.select: A.CorpID,A.ParentID,A.CorpName,A.CorpContact,A.CorpPhone,A.CorpAddress,B.CollaborationName, CASE WHEN A.Enable=1 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END AS Enable,A.CorpLevel
settings.from: T_SYS_Corporation A LEFT JOIN T_SYS_Collaboration B ON A.collaborationId=B.collaborationId
